CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Total_Sum_Insured__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Number_16_2_Text__c)) ), IF( TEXT(Total_Sum_Insured__c) = Number_16_2_Text__c, "✓ MATCH", "✗ MISMATCH - Number: " & TEXT(Total_Sum_Insured__c) & " vs Text: " & Number_16_2_Text__c ), "N/A" )
CustomField.label: Value Comparison
